segments.text: I'm observing a peculiar scene in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing quite dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is sheeting over the front edge of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a puddle on the floor and running down the cabinet doors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the woman at the sink seems completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's meticulously drying a plate with a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her gaze is fixed solely on her task, showing no awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already standing in the widening pool of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly focused to miss such an obvious flood?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost unsettling to witness her serene detachment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause serious water damage very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice before the whole kitchen is drenched.
segments.speaker: PAR
